          <description>
            <string language="hu">Itáliai kódexek</string>
            <string language="en">italian codexes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Lorenzo de?Medici,  imakönyv,  Firenze,  mecénás,  Angyali üdvözlet,  Attavante,  Mátyás király,  Corvina-könyvtár,  Beatrix királyné,  9. évfolyam,  </string>
            <string language="en">Lorenzo de Medici, prayer book, Florence, maecenas, annunciation, attavante, king Matthias, Corvina library, queen Beatrix, 9th class</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">italienische codexes</string>
          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">codexes italianos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lorenzo de Medici, Gebetbuch, Florenz, maecenas, 
Ankündigung, attavante, König Matthias, Corvina Bibliothek, Königin
Beatrix, 9. Kategorie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lorenzo de Medici, livre de prière, Florence, maecenas, 
annonce, attavante, le Roi Matthias, bibliothèque de Corvina, la 
Reine Beatrix, 9ème classe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lorenzo de Medici, livro do prayer, Florença, maecenas,
annunciation, attavante, rei Matthias, biblioteca de Corvina, rainha 
Beatrix, 9a classe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lorenzo de Medici, libro di preghiera, Firenze, 
maecenas, annuncio, attavante, re Matthias, libreria di Corvina, 
regina Beatrix, nono codice categoria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λορενζο δε Medici, βιβλίο προσευχής, Φλωρεντία, 
maecenas, annunciation, attavante, βασιλιάς Matthias, 
Corvina βιβλιοθήκη, βασίλισσα Beatrix, 9η κλάση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lorenzo de Medici, libro del rezo, Florencia, maecenas,
anuncio, attavante, rey Matthias, biblioteca de Corvina, reina 
Beatrix, 9na clase</string>
